General.Name: Kingfish Company Nv
General.Description: The Kingfish Company N.V. produces and sells seafood products in Western Europe, Southern Europe, and internationally. The company provides yellowtail kingfish. The Kingfish Company N.V. was incorporated in 2015 and is based in Kats, the Netherlands.
